Hmm?

Hi, I’m Syms Covington and I do odd jobs

on the boat.

Wow, this boat has a lot of people with various talents.

What’s that book you have there?

Just show us the interesting parts! Hee hee!

Oh, this? It’s a book called Principles of Geology.

It explains

how slow movements

of the earth’s surface have formed what

we see today.

Would you

like to read it?

Um, no thanks.

Ha ha ha!
